channel.title: How To Solve The 562 Ip Problem
channel.description:
Hello, i'm not asking for help.
Just aload of people on my msn have been asking me this so i thought i would come out and say it :D
[size=36pt] Step 1:[/size] Open your client folder.
[size=36pt] Step 2:[/size] Click ALT a toolbar pops up. click tools>folder options>view
[size=36pt] Step 1=3:[/size] Check the box show hidden folders. and click Ok.
[size=36pt] Step 4:[/size] Src> then scroll down to client.java> right click> open with notepad
[size=36pt] Step 5:[/size] CTRL F and type in the current server ip [IT SHOULD FIND IT] Then replace that ip with your own.
[size=36pt] Step 6:[/size] File>save>Compile
Thanks & Hoped i Helped you guys.

[size=36pt]
Step 1:[/size] Open your client folder.

[size=36pt]
Step 2:[/size] Click ALT a toolbar pops up. click tools>folder options>view

Step 4:[/size] Src> then scroll down to client.java> right click> open with notepad
